name: Andrewsfield Flying Club
about: Andrewsfield Flying Club, located in Essex, UK, is a comprehensive flying training organisation. We offer a wide range of courses from Private Pilot’s Licence (PPL) and Commercial Pilot’s Licence (CPL) to advanced training such as Flight Instructor ratings, Formation, and Aerobatics. As a licensed airfield, we provide training for use at busy airports and smaller strips, with links to Cambridge and Southend for instrument training. Our facilities include a comfortable clubhouse with a licensed bar and restaurant, fully equipped briefing rooms, a pilot shop, and offices. We are open seven days a week and also feature a Boeing 737 flight simulator. We partner with Naples Air Center, Florida, for UK CAA and FAA training. Our friendly team and first-rate instructors ensure a supportive and professional learning environment.
services: ["Private Pilot License\nCommercial Pilot License\nFlight Instructor (CFI / FI)"]
